texts.content: {"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,56],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"テレビの中の話だと思っていた「老後貧困」という言\n葉が、突然、\n自分の物語として目の前に突き付けられた夜でした。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,51],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"夫は一部上場企業に勤め上げてくれたし、\n老後は少し贅沢もできるかな、\nなんて淡い期待を抱いていました。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,24],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"全身の血の気が引くって、こういうことなんだと…。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,50],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"60歳を過ぎて初めて、\n夫が会社から持ち帰った「ねんきん定期便」というも\nのを夫婦二人で見たんです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,55],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"封を開けて、\nそこに記載されていた将来の年金見込み額の数字を見\nた瞬間、夫と顔を見合わせ、二人で絶句しました。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ１"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[1,1,1]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,17],"useLetterColor":true,"size":11,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"一日中家にいる夫に殺意を覚える瞬間"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,42],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"夫のその無神経な背中を見ていると、\n胸の奥からどす黒い感情が湧き上がってくるんです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,32],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"まるで私が三食昼寝付きの家政婦だとでも思っている\nのでしょうか。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,42],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"若い頃は束縛も愛情だなんて思えましたが、\n60歳を過ぎてからの束縛は、ただの鎖です。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,24],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"と提案しても、「俺は疲れてるんだ」の一点張り。　"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,51],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が少しでも退屈そうな顔をすると、\n「お前は俺がどれだけ苦労してきたか分かってない」\nと説教が始まる。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,30],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"どちらが疲れているかなんて、\n考えなくても分かるはずなのに。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,9],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"絶対に忘れません。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,35],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"だったら買い物も全部自分でやればいいのに、\nそれは絶対にしないんです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,27],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私にとって、\nそれは思い出の品だったかもしれないのに。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,35],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"そして、子供たちが帰った途端、\nまた元の無口で不機嫌な夫に戻るんです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,11],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"悪いのはそっちなのに。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,50],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"以上が、\n「一日中家にいる夫へのストレス」というテーマに寄\nせられた、シニアの皆さんの口コミでした。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,33],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"一日中、この光景が続くのかと思うと、\n目の前が真っ暗になりました。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,13],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"と声が聞こえてくる時です。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,32],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"たまの息抜きさえ、\n夫の許可を得なければならないような息苦しさ。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,19],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"　　私が「たまには散歩でもしたら？」　"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,14],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"正直、邪魔でしかありません。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,47],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"同じ話を何十回も聞かされ、\nその度に「すごいわねぇ」と相槌を打つこちらの身に\nもなってほしい。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,45],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"「自分の城」だと思っているのかもしれませんが、\nその城を綺麗に保っているのは一体誰なのか。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,29],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"その幼稚さに、\n殺意よりも先に呆れた気持ちが湧いてきます。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,31],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"感謝の言葉なんて、\n結婚してから一度も聞いたことがありません。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,26],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"一日中家にいて楽をしていた人と、\n外で働いてきた私。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,34],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が本当に高熱で寝込んだ時、\n夫はカップラーメンをすすっていました。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,32],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"夫は、\n私が自分の知らない世界で輝くのが怖いのかもしれま\nせん。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,16],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"家計を管理しているのは私なのに。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,39],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"」と聞くと、「あんな古いの、\n着ないだろと思って捨てといたぞ」と得意げに言う。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,14],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"自分勝手にもほどがあります。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,46],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"現役時代は、\n会社でそれなりの地位にいたのかもしれないけれど、\n今はただの無職の老人なのに。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,27],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"壁に向かって話している方が、\nまだマシかもしれません。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,26],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"あのシャツを、\n夫の顔に叩きつけてやりたくなります。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,23],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"おかげで、一人で運転する時より何倍も疲れます。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,16],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"その豹変ぶりに、吐き気がします。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,38],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"彼にとっては、私の「大切にしているもの」なんて、\nどうでもいいんでしょうね。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,37],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"この人と夫婦でいる意味って、一体何なんだろうと、\n本気で考えてしまいます。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,35],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"自分の生活リズムが、\nこの家の絶対的なルールだと思い込んでいるんです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,44],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"夫は、私が女でいることをやめて、\nただの家政婦になることを望んでいるのかもしれませ\nん。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,28],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"人の話を聞く能力が、\n完全に欠落しているんだと思います。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,39],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"そして、\n自分がどれだけ大変かをアピールしているようで、\n無性に腹が立ちます。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,17],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が稼ぐお金は、家族のお金なのに。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,44],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"あなたにとって、私はその程度の存在なんですね、\nと、全ての感情が冷めていくのを感じます。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,19],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"まるで、私が夫の秘書かなにかのように。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,9],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"」と逆ギレされる。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,24],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"彼にとっては、これが「当たり前」の日常なんです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,63],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"もしよろしければ、
今日ご紹介した中で一番胸に刺さった口コミや、
あなただけが抱えている実体験を、
コメントで教えてください。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,33],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"それでは最後までご視聴いただき、本当に、\nありがとうございました。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,37],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が洗濯機を回し、掃除機をかけている間も、\nただただテレビの音だけが響く。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,24],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"感謝もなければ、自分で淹れようという気配もない。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,58],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"今日は、
「一日中家にいる夫へのストレス」というテーマで、
シニアの皆さんのリアルな口コミを30個、
ご紹介します。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,35],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が昼食の準備を何も始めていないのに、\nリビングから「今日の昼、何？」"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,34],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"退職した途端、\n思考能力まで退化してしまったのかと本気で思います\n。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,15],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"まるで監視されているようです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,12],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"一日中テレビの番人です。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,35],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"あまりにやることがないので、\n私が家事をしている後をついて回ることも。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,10],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"もう聞き飽きました。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,27],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"注意すると、「後でやる」と言って、\n絶対にやりません。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,36],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が自分以外の人間と楽しそうにしているのが、\n気に入らないんでしょうね。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,24],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"だったら自分で作ってみろ、と喉まで出かかります。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,7],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"と言われた時。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,41],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"「熱がある」「頭が痛い」と何度もアピールしてきて\n、一日中その看病をさせられます。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,49],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"例えば、地域のコーラス教室に興味があると言えば、\n「お前みたいな音痴にできるわけない」と鼻で笑う。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,37],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"「こんな高い肉、\n誰が買うんだ」とか「お菓子ばっかり買いやがって」\nとか。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,12],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"後で「あのセーターどこ？"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,48],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"そのくせ、\n私がたまに友人と食事してお酒を飲んで帰ると、\n「女のくせに飲み歩いて」と嫌味を言う。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,24],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"自分は何様なんだろうと、冷たい気持ちになります。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,27],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"人間として扱われていないような、\n深い屈辱を感じます。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,24],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私の家事労働を、なんだと思っているのでしょうか。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,15],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"まるで教習所の教官気取りです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,15],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"普段の横暴な態度はどこへやら。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,36],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"何度注意しても、「ああ、\nごめんごめん」と口先だけで全く直そうとしない。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,27],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私の体のことではなく、\n自分の食事のことしか頭にない。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,11],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"何の配慮もありません。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,17],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私だって、少しはおしゃれをしたい。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,50],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"例えば、私が友人の話をしているのに、\n「俺の友達の〇〇もな…」と、\n全く関係ない自分の話をし始める。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,21],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"聞いているだけで、こっちまで疲れてきます。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,40],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"そのパート代がなければ、\nこの家の家計がどれだけ大変か、\n分かっていないんです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,13],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"視線すらこちらに向けない。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,33],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が「今日は燃えるゴミの日よ」と言うと、\nようやく重い腰を上げる。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,23],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"あまりにうるさいので体を揺すると、「なんだよ！"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,22],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"それが一番、殺意を覚える瞬間かもしれません。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,24],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"今、あなたは、どんな気持ちでこれを見ていますか？"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,32],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"まだの方は、チャンネル登録もしていただけると、\n励みになります。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,84],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"朝食の片付けを終えて、
ようやく一息つこうとリビングに戻ると、
夫はすでにパジャマから着替えることもなく、
ソファの指定席に深く沈み込んでワイドショーを見て
いました。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,26],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"そして聞こえてくるんです、「おい、\nお茶」の一言が。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,10],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"皆さん、こんばんは。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,6],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"さちこです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,6],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"午前11時。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,31],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"現役時代は、\nお昼ご飯のことなんて自分で考えていたはずなのに。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,59],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が友人とのランチや買い物に出かけようとすると、\n「どこへ行くんだ」「何時に帰ってくるんだ」と必ず\n尋問してくること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,11],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"とにかく趣味がない夫。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,21],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"何に疲れているのか、問い詰めたくなります。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,9],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"昔の仕事の自慢話。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,9],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"地獄のループです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,59],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が一生懸命掃除をしたそばから、\nポテトチップスの食べカスをこぼしたり、\n読んだ新聞をぐちゃぐちゃに放置したりする時。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,61],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が電話で友人と楽しそうに話していると、\nわざと近くに来て咳払いをしたり、\n大きな音を立てたりして会話を妨害してくること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,65],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が作った料理に対して、
一口食べるなり「今日の味噌汁、
味が薄いな」とか「この煮物、ちょっと硬い」とか、
必ず文句から入ること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,51],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私がパートから疲れて帰ってきても、\n「お疲れ様」の一言もなく、\nソファに寝転がったまま「夕飯まだか？」"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,29],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"この人には思いやりという感情がないんだな、\nと絶望します。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,31],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"風邪を引いたくらいで、\nまるで死ぬかのような大騒ぎをすること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,29],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が何か新しいことを始めようとすると、\n必ず水を差すこと。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,40],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"スーパーの買い物についてきて、\n私がカゴに入れたものにいちいちケチをつけること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,23],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が知らない間に、勝手に私の物を捨てている時。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,22],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"人の心を踏みにじる、最低の行為だと思います。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,45],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"現役時代は付き合いで飲んで帰ることもあったのに、\n定年後は一滴もお酒を飲まなくなりました。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,59],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"テレビのクイズ番組を見ながら、\n出演者に向かって「こんなのも分からないのか、\n馬鹿だな」と悪態をついている姿を見た時。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,35],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が何かを尋ねても、テレビから一瞬も目を離さず、\n生返事だけを返す時。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,61],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が苦労してアイロンをかけたシャツを、\nほんの数分着ただけで「やっぱり暑い」と言って脱ぎ\n捨て、ソファに丸めて放置した時。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,63],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が運転している車の助手席で、\n道案内でもないのに「そこ曲がれ」とか「スピード出\nしすぎだ」とか、いちいち口出ししてくること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,39],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"子供や孫が家に遊びに来た時だけ、\n急に「優しいおじいちゃん」を演じ始めること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,34],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が大切に育てている庭の花壇を、\n平気で踏みつけて通り道にすること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,43],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が少しでも体調が悪そうにしていると、\n「俺のご飯はどうなるんだ」と心配してくること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,40],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"休日の朝、私がまだ寝ているのに、\nリビングで早朝からテレビを大音量でつけること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,55],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が新しい服を買ってきたり、
美容院に行ったりすると、
「そんな金があるなら貯金しろ」と必ず言ってくるこ
と。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,24],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が話している途中で、自分の話にすり替えること。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,38],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"何をするにも、「よいしょ」「どっこいしょ」と、\nいちいち大きな声で言うこと。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,41],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私がパートで稼いだお金を、\n「どうせお前の小遣いだろ」と見下したように言うこ\nと。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,33],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"私が真剣な話をしようとしても、\nスマホをいじりながら聞いている時。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,29],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"ゴミ出しの日を、\n結婚してから一度も覚えたことがないこと。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,19],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"寝室で、いびきがうるさくて眠れない夜。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,22],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"毎晩、別の部屋で寝たいと本気で思っています。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,36],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"そして何より、これら全てのことを、\n夫自身が全く悪いと思っていないこと。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,13],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"画面の向こうの、あなたへ。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"solid":{"color":[0,0,0]},"render_type":"solid"}},"range":[0,59],"useLetterColor":true,"size":5,"font":{"path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf","id":""}}],"text":"ここで語られるあなたの口コミが、\n同じように暗い夜を一人で過ごしている誰かの心を、\nきっと、少しだけ軽くするはずです。"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ１"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ２"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ３"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ４"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ５"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ６"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ７"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ８"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,4],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ９"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[0.5058823823928833,0.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/CapCut.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/en.ttf"},"range":[0,5],"size":5,"useLetterColor":true}],"text":"口コミ１０"}
